title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah in Southern Lebanon: Air Defense Intercepts Aerial Threat”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF targeted sites of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in southern Lebanon; Air defense forces intercepted a suspicious aerial target in southern Lebanon.

Combat aircraft recently attacked a military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Yaroun area. Additionally, the forces carried out artillery fire to remove a threat in the Amara area of southern Lebanon.

Furthermore, air defense fighters intercepted a suspicious aerial target in southern Lebanon. Alerts were not activated according to policy, and there are no casualties.

IDF forces attacked last night (Saturday) a military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the area of the village of Kila and a terror infrastructure of the organization in the Marwajin area of southern Lebanon.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://we.tl/t-Lg9n9PeZRR
